title: Transformer
description: Transformers is an action-packed sci-fi film where giant alien robots, the Autobots and Decepticons, bring their war to Earth. Caught in the middle, a young man must protect a powerful artifact. With thrilling battles, cutting-edge effects, and explosive drama, the film explores heroism, sacrifice, and the fate of two worlds.

title: Meg 2
description: Meg 2: The Trench plunges into the depths of the ocean where a team of scientists faces colossal prehistoric sea creatures. When megalodons and other deadly threats rise from the deep, survival becomes a battle. Packed with suspense, action, and underwater thrills, this sequel amps up the monstrous danger dramatically.

title: Fast X
description: Fast X launches the Fast & Furious saga into its final chapters, as Dom Toretto faces his most personal enemy yet. With high-stakes chases, explosive stunts, and global adventures, the crew battles a vengeful foe from the past. Loyalty, family, and fast cars fuel this thrilling ride to the finish.

title: Jailer
description: In Jailer, a seemingly ordinary prison officer hides a mysterious past. When danger threatens his family, he unleashes a fierce side to protect them. With gripping action, sharp twists, and Rajinikanth’s commanding presence, the film blends suspense, emotion, and style in a story of justice, redemption, and buried secrets.

title: Beautiful Disaster
description: Beautiful Disaster follows Abby, a college freshman trying to escape a troubled past, and Travis, a charismatic bad boy with secrets of his own. Their chemistry is undeniable, leading to a passionate, chaotic relationship. This emotional rollercoaster explores love, pain, and the struggle to change while staying true to yourself.

title: Ape vs. Mecha Ape
description: Ape vs. Mecha Ape unleashes a colossal clash between a giant, rampaging gorilla and a high-tech robotic counterpart built to stop it. As cities crumble and chaos erupts, humanity’s fate hangs in the balance. This action-packed battle of brains versus brawn delivers intense destruction and unexpected alliances in a thrilling showdown.

title: Assassin
description: Assassin follows a covert operative involved in high-risk missions, navigating a world of espionage, betrayal, and deadly consequences. With sharp skills and a mysterious past, the assassin must confront powerful enemies and moral dilemmas. This gritty action thriller explores identity, loyalty, and survival in a game where trust can kill.

title: No Hard Feelings
description: No Hard Feelings is a romantic comedy that follows a free-spirited woman hired to help a shy, socially awkward young man gain confidence before college. As they spend time together, sparks fly, leading to unexpected chemistry, self-discovery, and hilarious moments. A heartwarming story of love and personal growth.

title: Peter Pan & Wendy
description: Peter Pan & Wendy brings a fresh twist to the beloved classic. Wendy, Peter, and their companions journey to Neverland, where they face challenges, adventure, and the clash between growing up and staying young. This reimagined tale explores bravery, family, and the magic of childhood dreams.

title: Heart of Stone
description: Heart of Stone follows the story of a secret agent embedded in an elite team with a mysterious mission. As secrets unravel, trust is tested and a high-stakes game of survival ensues. Action-packed, with heart-stopping suspense, the film blends espionage and intense drama, keeping viewers on edge.

title: The Little Mermaid
description: The Little Mermaid is a live-action adaptation of the beloved animated classic. Ariel, a young mermaid princess, dreams of living on land and falls in love with a human prince. With the help of her friends, she faces the consequences of making a dangerous deal with the sea witch.

title: Sixty Five
description: Sixty Five follows a pilot and his young daughter who crash land on a mysterious planet, only to discover that it’s Earth 65 million years ago, inhabited by dinosaurs. Struggling for survival, they must navigate the prehistoric terrain, facing dangers while seeking a way back to safety.

title: The Black Demon
description: The Black Demon is a gripping thriller about a massive, ancient shark that terrorizes a small coastal town. A marine biologist, determined to protect his family, uncovers dark secrets while facing the relentless beast. The film explores survival, fear, and the primal instincts of both predator and prey.

title: The Tank
description: The Tank is a suspenseful horror movie that follows a group of soldiers trapped inside a massive military tank in the midst of an apocalyptic war. As the outside world collapses, the tension rises within, and they must confront both their own fears and the terrifying creatures lurking outside.

title: The Covenant
description: The Covenant is an action-packed thriller that revolves around a special forces unit sent on a dangerous mission in a war-torn region. As the stakes rise, they discover a conspiracy that challenges their loyalty and survival. With tension and betrayal at every turn, trust becomes their greatest weapon.
